'''Fine Incense''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|Hereafter: Return to the Mountains}}. It is used by offering it to the statue of [[Pervases]].

It can also be obtained after the quest by speaking to [[Wang Ping'an]], but only one may be owned at a time.
